senses.de: To reach a place, usually at the end of a trip.
senses.ex: I arrived at the school early in the morning.

Tips.title: Journey's End
Tips.description: Use 'arrive' to describe the moment someone or something reaches the final destination after traveling.
Tips.example: We finally arrived at the hotel after a long flight.

Tips.title: Specific Location
Tips.description: 'Arrive' is often followed by a specific place, like 'at the station' or 'in New York'.
Tips.example: She arrived at the airport in time for her flight.

Tips.title: Time Reference
Tips.description: Pair 'arrive' with a time expression to indicate when the arrival happened.

senses.de: To succeed in a particular situation or place.
senses.ex: He arrived in the music industry after years of hard work.

Tips.title: Career Milestone
Tips.description: Use 'arrive' to talk about reaching an important stage in professional or personal growth.
Tips.example: After years of training, she has finally arrived as a principal dancer.

Tips.title: Highlight Success
Tips.description: When some professional becomes well-known, saying they 'have arrived' implies notable success.
Tips.example: The author has arrived in the literary world with his bestselling novel.

Tips.title: Metaphorical Use
Tips.description: The word can also be used metaphorically to mean becoming successful or gaining acceptance.
Tips.example: He didn't just arrive in comedy; he reinvented it.

senses.de: To be given or sent to someone, usually by post or delivery.
senses.ex: The package arrived in the morning.

Tips.title: Receiving Items
Tips.description: When something is delivered, use 'arrive' to express that it has been received.
Tips.example: Has the gift you ordered online arrived yet?

Tips.title: Passive Construction
Tips.description: In sentences about mail delivery, 'arrive' is commonly used in passive voice.
Tips.example: The invitations were arrived late due to the postal strike.

Tips.title: Anticipation
Tips.description: Use 'arrive' to describe something awaited with excitement or importance.
Tips.example: The moment we had all been waiting for arrived—the concert started!

Attain.wordDefinition:
Attain means to achieve or reach a goal through effort or skill.

It is often used in the context of personal or professional achievement. For example, one might say "I attained my goal of graduating with honors" or "I hope to attain a leadership position in my company.".

Arrive describes reaching a physical destination, while attain describes reaching a personal or professional goal through effort or skill.

Come.wordDefinition:
Come is used when someone moves from one place to another to join another person or group. For example, if you are inviting a friend over to your house, you can say "Come over to my house".

Arrive is used when someone reaches a destination and come is used when someone moves towards another person or group.

Enter.wordDefinition:
Enter typically refers to moving through a physical entrance or doorway to access a new space, such as a room or a building.

For example, if someone leaves their home and enters a store, they have moved through the store's entrance to access the interior space.

Arrive is used when referring to reaching a destination, whereas enter is used when referring to moving through a doorway or entrance to access a new space.

Hit.wordDefinition:
Hit can have a few different meanings, but generally refers to making contact with something forcefully.

We might use it when talking about hitting a baseball, or hitting a curb while driving.

Arrive is used more to talk about reaching a destination or goal, while hit is used more to talk about making contact with something forcefully.

Land.wordDefinition:
Arrive means to reach a destination, while land specifically refers to arriving by airplane or spacecraft at an airport or spacecraft landing site.

For example, you could arrive at a friend's house, a hotel, or a restaurant. But you would only say a plane or a spacecraft 'landed' at an airport or landing site.

Arrive is a more general term, while land is more specific to transportation arrival by plane or spacecraft.

Make it.wordDefinition:
Make it can have a few different meanings, but typically it means to successfully accomplish something or to arrive somewhere despite challenges or obstacles.

For example, if you have a job interview at 10am and you arrive on time, you can say "I made it to my interview on time!" It can also mean to attend an event or social gathering.

For example, if your friend invites you to a party and you show up, they might say "You made it!"

Arrive refers specifically to reaching a destination, while make it can refer to successfully accomplishing something, overcoming obstacles, or attending an event.

Pull in.wordDefinition:
Arrive means to reach a destination, while pull in means to enter a specific spot or area.

Arrive can be used for any situation where someone reaches a destination like arriving at a friend's house or arriving at a vacation spot.

Pull in is used when the person or thing arrives at a specific spot or area, like pulling into a parking space or pulling into a harbor with a boat.

Reach.wordDefinition:
Both arrive and reach refer to the act of reaching a destination.

However, arrive means specifically to reach the end of a journey or to reach a destination that you have been planning to go to.

Reach on the other hand means to arrive at a place, goal or destination which could be physical or metaphorical. For example, when you reach for something, you are extending your arm to grab it.

When you reach a goal in a video game or a sport, you have successfully accomplished something.

The main difference is that arrive is more specific to arriving at a planned destination, while reach is more general and can be applied to different contexts.

quotes.Text: I always say I want to leave this world in a better state than when I arrived, and I continue to live by that message. So I'm going to do what I can to make the world a better place but also just make sure that I'm happy as well.
quotes.Title: American Activist
quotes.Name: Jazz Jennings

quotes.Text: Tomorrow is the most important thing in life. Comes into us at midnight very clean. It's perfect when it arrives and it puts itself in our hands. It hopes we've learned something from yesterday.
quotes.Title: American Actor
quotes.Name: John Wayne

quotes.Text: There are new children arriving and trying to reach our lucky country every day, and I hope that we can all work together to help them find their dream, too.
quotes.Title: Scottish Musician
quotes.Name: Jimmy Barnes

quotes.Text: It's important for the coach when you arrive to understand the players and to understand every single player's strength and their weakness.
quotes.Title: Italian Coach
quotes.Name: Antonio Conte

quotes.Text: Each friend represents a world in us, a world not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born.
quotes.Title: American Author
quotes.Name: Anais Nin

quotes.Text: Since I arrived at CNN, it has grown into one of the largest and most trusted news organizations in the world.
quotes.Title: American Businessman
quotes.Name: Jim Walton

quotes.Text: Being a young player arriving at a big club is great. It's something that really helps me on the way.
quotes.Name: Eric Bailly

quotes.Text: To give a character life in a short space of time, it helps if you arrive on screen with a past.
quotes.Title: French Actress
quotes.Name: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.Text: Life is lived on levels and arrived at in stages.
quotes.Title: American Author
quotes.Name: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.Text: Until Eve arrived, this was a man's world.
quotes.Title: American Poet
quotes.Name: Richard Armour
